name: Outdoor Survivor
description:
a Real-Time Strategy Survivor Game with a randomized world that's based in the Modern Days during the Quarantine Lock-down playing as a Homeless man with only one goal to keep him alive!

The game contains humorist themes for fun but We really hope you'll get the real message, during this crisis we hope everyone stay safe and contribute to give any helping hand if possible!

Hope you'll enjoy playing the game!
